Trendy is a high-performance, scalable API platform designed for social media marketing services. Built with speed and security in mind, it provides a robust foundation for managing users, orders, payments, and services with enterprise-grade reliability.

üéØ Key Features

Authentication: Dual authentication system with JWT tokens (3-day expiry) and permanent API keys for integrations.

User Management: Complete CRUD operations with role-based permissions (Admin, Reseller, User).

Category System: Organized service categories with SEO-friendly slugs and custom icons.

Order Processing: Track orders from submission to completion with real-time status updates.

Payment Integration: Support for multiple payment gateways with automatic fee calculation.

üì° Quick Start

Get started with Trendy API in minutes:

POST /api/auth/register
{
"email": "user@example.com",
"password": "secure_password",
"first_name": "John",
"last_name": "Doe",
"phone_number": "+1234567890"
}

// Returns JWT token instantly

All subsequent requests require authentication header:
Authorization: Bearer <token> or Authorization: ApiKey <key>
